meanings.sent1: The old cat looked grumpier than usual today.
meanings.sent2: He becomes grumpier when he doesn't get enough sleep.
meanings.sent3: Even the grumpier squirrel couldn't resist the tasty nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her face grew grumpier than a storm cloud before the rain.
meanings.sent5: The grumpier clouds seemed to darken the whole sky.

meanings.definition: Showing a bad temper or irritability
meanings.sent1: The grumpier expression on his face made everyone cautious.
meanings.sent2: She was grumpier than usual after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The grumpier puppy refused to share its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: His grumpier tone of voice startled the usually calm room.
meanings.sent5: The grumpier atmosphere in the room was palpable to all.
